colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CE SNGAGS MKHAN NGAR GLUD SHUL MDOS GDON GROL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DE LTA SNYIGS MA'I LNGA BDO BA'I DUS 'DIR DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA RNAMS KYI MTHU CHANG BA DANG, NAG PHYOGS SKYONG BA RNAMS KYI MTHU CHANG BA DANG, NAG PHYOGS SKYONG BA RNAMS KYI MTHU CHE BAR BYUNG BA'I DUS SU, ,YI DAM CHOS SKYONG GI BSNYEN PA LAS RUNG GI BGRANGS DU MA LONGS PAR RNYID DANG BKUR STE'I CHED DU SROG LA MA STOS PAR KYAM KYAM DU SONG BA RNAMS MANG BA'I PHYIR, YON BDAG GI GDON BGEGS BAR CHAD RJES SU MI 'BRANG BCOS THABS ZAB MO 'DI MED DU MI RUNG BAS DAM PA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I SHUL MDOS YAS GZHI BYAS TE, BRTZON PA DANG LDAN PA THO YON BLO BZANG SBYIN PA DANG, SBOBS PA SHES RAB DANG LDAN PA AU RANG THO YON KUN DGA' RIN CHEN GNYIS KYI BSKUL BA'I NGOR, KHYI LA SENGGE ZHES MTSAN BTAGS PA AER TE NA ZHABS DRUNG NO YON CHOS RJE ZHES 'BOD PA GZHAN DE NI CHOS BRGYAD KYIS 'KHOL BAR GANG BDAG GI DGE SLONG GI GZUGS 'CHANG BA SU MA TI, AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS THAR PA'I CHOS RNAMS LA DGOS PA MED KYANG, THOB KYI 'JAL BAS BRNYED 'TSOL BA RNAMS LA PHAN SNYAM BSAM PAS KHA BO SKANG TE SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO THO YON KUN DGA' RIN CHEN NO, ,'DIS KYANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
